name: Soplaculos
author: Xio Kevin
notes: Okay so I was struggling in legend 3 with flying fish, went down to legend 1, and started using saffira, went all the way back to legend 3, but I never got 5 wins in a row, so I just made this deck TODAY! and proceeded to immediately win 5 in a row, and my KoG rankup matchup was against balance cyber angeles and I still won, this deck is too easy and very strong...
